013package org.apache.juneau.rest;
014
015import static org.apache.juneau.common.internal.Utils.*;
016import static org.apache.juneau.internal.CollectionUtils.*;
017
018import java.util.*;
019
020import jakarta.servlet.*;
021
022import org.apache.juneau.*;
023import org.apache.juneau.common.internal.*;
024import org.apache.juneau.cp.*;
025import org.apache.juneau.internal.*;
026import org.apache.juneau.rest.annotation.*;
027import org.apache.juneau.rest.util.*;
028
029/**
030 * Implements the child resources of a {@link Rest}-annotated class.
031 *
032 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
033 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="../../../../index.html#jrs.AnnotatedClasses">@Rest-Annotated Classes</a>
034 * </ul>
035 */
036public class RestChildren {
037
038   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
039   // Static
040   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
041
042   /**
043    * Represents a null value for the {@link Rest#restChildrenClass()} annotation.
044    */
045   @SuppressWarnings("javadoc")
046   public final class Void extends RestChildren {
047      public Void(Builder builder) throws Exception {
048         super(builder);
049      }
050   }
051
052   /**
053    * Static creator.
054    *
055    * @param beanStore The bean store to use for creating beans.
056    * @return A new builder for this object.
057    */
058   public static Builder create(BeanStore beanStore) {
059      return new Builder(beanStore);
060   }
061
062   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
063   // Builder
064   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
065
066   /**
067    * Builder class.
068    */
069   @FluentSetters
070   public static class Builder extends BeanBuilder<RestChildren> {
071
072      final List<RestContext> list;
073
074      /**
075       * Constructor.
076       *
077       * @param beanStore The bean store to use for creating beans.
078       */
079      protected Builder(BeanStore beanStore) {
080         super(RestChildren.class, beanStore);
081         list = Utils.list();
082      }
083
084      @Override /* BeanBuilder */
085      protected RestChildren buildDefault() {
086         return new RestChildren(this);
087      }
088
089      //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
090      // Properties
091      //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
092
093      /**
094       * Adds a child resource to this builder.
095       *
096       * @param value The REST context of the child resource.
097       * @return This object.
098       */
099      public Builder add(RestContext value) {
100         list.add(value);
101         return this;
102      }
103
104      // <FluentSetters>
105
106      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.BeanBuilder */
107      public Builder impl(Object value) {
108         super.impl(value);
109         return this;
110      }
111
112      @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.BeanBuilder */
113      public Builder type(Class<?> value) {
114         super.type(value);
115         return this;
116      }
117
118      // </FluentSetters>
119   }
120
121   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
122   // Instance
123   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
124
125   private final Map<String,RestContext> children = synced(map());
126
127   /**
128    * Constructor.
129    *
130    * @param builder The builder containing the settings for this object.
131    */
132   public RestChildren(Builder builder) {
133      for (RestContext rc : builder.list)
134         children.put(rc.getPath(), rc);
135   }
136
137   /**
138    * Looks through the registered children of this object and returns the best match.
139    *
140    * @param builder The HTTP call builder.
141    * @return The child that best matches the call, or an empty {@link Optional} if a match could not be made.
142    */
143   public Optional<RestChildMatch> findMatch(RestSession.Builder builder) {
144      String pi = builder.getPathInfoUndecoded();
145      if ((! children.isEmpty()) && pi != null && ! pi.equals("/")) {
146         for (RestContext rc : children.values()) {
147            UrlPathMatcher upp = rc.getPathMatcher();
148            UrlPathMatch uppm = upp.match(builder.getUrlPath());
149            if (uppm != null) {
150               return Utils.opt(RestChildMatch.create(uppm, rc));
151            }
152         }
153      }
154      return opte();
155   }
156
157   /**
158    * Returns the children in this object as a map.
159    *
160    * <p>
161    * The keys are the {@link RestContext#getPath() paths} of the child contexts.
162    *
163    * @return The children as an unmodifiable map.
164    */
165   public Map<String,RestContext> asMap() {
166      return u(children);
167   }
168
169   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
170   // Lifecycle methods.
171   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
172
173   /**
174    * Called during servlet initialization on all children to invoke all {@link RestPostInit} child-last methods.
175    *
176    * @throws ServletException Error occurred.
177    */
178   public void postInit() throws ServletException {
179      for (RestContext childContext : children.values())
180         childContext.postInit();
181   }
182
183   /**
184    * Called during servlet initialization on all children to invoke all {@link RestPostInit} child-first methods.
185    *
186    * @throws ServletException Error occurred.
187    */
188   public void postInitChildFirst() throws ServletException {
189      for (RestContext childContext : children.values())
190         childContext.postInitChildFirst();
191   }
192
193   /**
194    * Called during servlet destruction on all children to invoke all {@link RestDestroy} and {@link Servlet#destroy()} methods.
195    */
196   public void destroy() {
197      for (RestContext r : children.values()) {
198         r.destroy();
199         if (r.getResource() instanceof Servlet)
200            ((Servlet)r.getResource()).destroy();
201      }
202   }
203}
